FILE: cm002380v11.0.txt
DYAD: USA - SWEDEN
RIVALRY: RIV79
DISPUTE(S): MID1660 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170730
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170730

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

WWI MIDs: MID1660

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
The United States detained the Swedish ships *Kronprins Gustaf Adolf* and *Pacific* from June 23, 1917 to July 19, 1918. Sweden protested the detentions as violations of the *Swedish-American Treaties*, which were signed on April 3, 1783, and requested financial compensation for the detentions. The countries agreed to submit the dispute to the *Permanent Court of Arbitration* (PCA) on December 17, 1930. The PCA issued a decision in favor of the US on July 18, 1932.

SOURCES-CM: 
*American Journal of International Law *(AJIL), 1932, 720-734, 834-903; Stuyt, 1990, 409; *Survey of International Affairs *(SIA), 1932, 609.
UN Reports of International Arbitral Awards, Volume II pp. 1239-1305. 18 July 1932. 

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:
